page.title: 03Mr. Takle's Farm
page.content: Mr Takle's Farm is called Treborough Farm. It is high up on the Brendon Hills. Mr. Takle took us around his farm in a tractor and trailer. It was good fun! We took a photograph of Mr and Mrs Takle with the group that visitied the farm. Mr. Takle believes the farm to date like the Church at Treborough from the 14th Century. The farm buildings have been built from slate from the nearby Slate Quarry. This Quarry is no longer worked but it is now used as Municipal Refuse tip serving the whole of West Somerset.
